title: Avengers, Ensemble! Benefits of ensembling in grapheme-to-phoneme prediction
authors:
Gautam, Vagrant  and
Li, Wang Yau  and
Mahmood, Zafarullah  and
Mailhot, Fred  and
Nadig, Shreekantha  and
Wang, Riqiang  and
Zhang, Nathan
venue: Proceedings of the 18th SIGMORPHON Workshop on Computational Research in Phonetics, Phonology, and Morphology
abstract: We describe three baseline beating systems for the high-resource English-only sub-task of the SIGMORPHON 2021 Shared Task 1: a small ensemble that Dialpadâ€™s speech recognition team uses internally, a well-known off-the-shelf model, and a larger ensemble model comprising these and others. We additionally discuss the challenges related to the provided data, along with the processing steps we took.
